name: Line Picture
description:
Tap the screen from the beginning block then move your finger across the chessboard, cover all blocks with a disjoint line to reveal the secret picture.

As the chessboard goes more complex, challenge yourself to draw the picture at your first sight of the maze.

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Simple rules don't get lost in this endless maze
* Discover as many secret pictures as you can!
